name: Monster Makeover
description:
Welcome to the MONSTER MAKEOVER!
The most fashionable and fun monster makeover on the itunes!
These adorable monsters need a scary cool makeover!

Monster Shave Makeover! Help these fabulous and fun monsters get ready for their Makeup & Dressup & SPA! Choose from 4 scary cute monsters and let

the style fun begin. Hair,Necklace,Shoes! Use facial tools to pop pimples and remove warts. Make fresh Mouth and don’t forget to Remove the monster's

Face Dust. So much fun!

Get ready favorite monsters! Style the monsters and give them Style gorgeous makeovers.!

Features:
> Best Facial
> Shape and style eyebrows with professional tweezers.
> Remove The Pimples using tweezers.
> Remove warts with the wart remover.
> Use face cream, & more to style your monsters for Gorgeousl!
> Snap a picture to show off your monster’s new look!
> Tap the Eyeball Select & Kepp Best Eyeball.
> Pop zits with special gloves !
>Select Necklace,Shoes, & More Things.
>Finall Dressup With Good Dress Style And Ready Monster Amazing!!

What's inside:
4 scary cute monsters !
12 Spa treatment tools !
10+ More Option For Makeup!
10+ More Option For Dressing Style!
